name: Shadow Bullets
description:
Shadow Bullets is a 2D Top-Down shooter where your weapon is also what's pulling you down.

Darkness is coming closer with each shadow bullet you own, don't let it come near you or it'll consume you !

At the end of each even wave you can boost yourself with some power-ups like :

  • More bullets
  • More health, speed, damage...
  • A counter ability
  • And more !

This game was made for the Winter Jam 2022 in less that 72h, it may contain few bugs or glitches.
